1.title: Fat Joe with Jadakiss and Remy Ma/Omari Hardwick/Sean McVay
1.plot: Molly and Stephen A. return and join Max to kickoff a new season on a new set from ESPN studios at Seaport District on Pier 16 and 17 in New York City, New York U.S.A.; musical performances by Fat Joe with Jadakiss and Remy Ma; more.

2.title: Kevin Knox/Mike Tomlin/Victor Cruz
2.plot: National Football League analyst Victor Cruz joins in to debate: how long can the Philadelphia Eagles go without quarterback Carson Wentz?; an interview with Pittsburgh Steelers head football coach Mike Tomlin; and much more.

3.title: Alani "La La" Anthony/Damien Woody/James Harrison/Paul Finebaum
3.plot: National Football League analyst Damien Woody joins in to debate: how much pressure is on Minnesota Vikings quarterback Kirk Cousins?; an interview with actress, author, etc. Alani "La La" Anthony; and much more.

4.title: Damien Woody/Jason Witten/Will Cain
4.plot: National Football League analyst Damien Woody joins in to preview tonight's 2018 NFL Regular Season opener between the Atlanta Falcons at the Philadelphia Eagles; and much more.

5.title: Louis Riddick/Shelton "Spike" Lee/Tim Tebow/Travis Kelce/Will Cain
5.plot: National Football League front office insider Louis Riddick joins in to discuss last night's Atlanta Falcons at Philadelphia Eagles game; an interview with actor, filmmaker, etc. Shelton "Spike" Lee; and much more.

6.title: Anthony "Booger" McFarland/Damien Woody/Will Cain
6.plot: National Football League analyst Damien Woody joins in to discuss last night's Chicago Bears at Green Bay Packers game; and much more.

7.title: Ryan Clark/Will Cain/"Two & Out?"
7.plot: National Football League analyst Ryan Clark joins in to discuss last night's New York Jets at Detroit Lions game; Stephen's A-List: Top 5 NFL Teams; and much more.

8.title: Carson Palmer/Damien Woody/Paul Finebaum
8.plot: National Football League analyst Damien Woody joins in to debate if Detroit Lions head coach Matt Patricia or his players are to blame for their blowout loss on Monday night to the New York Jets; and much more.

9.title: Canelo vs GGG 2: Dan Rafael/Darren Woodson/Teddy Atlas/Tedy Bruschi
9.plot: Molly, Max and Stephen A. are live from Beer Park at Paris Las Vegas in Paradise, Nevada U.S.A. to preview Saturday night's Canelo Alvarez vs. Gennady Golovkin boxing match; and much more.

10.title: Canelo vs GGG 2: Jim Lampley/Louis Riddick/Oscar De La Hoya/Tim Tebow
10.plot: Sportscaster Jim Lampley joins in to preview tomorrow night's Canelo Alvarez vs. Gennady Golovkin boxing match; college football analyst Tim Tebow joins in to preview tomorrow's marquee match-ups; and much more.

11.title: Damien Woody/Victor Cruz
11.plot: Molly and Stephen A. return to the ESPN studios at Seaport District on Pier 17 in New York City, New York U.S.A. while Max is live from the ESPN studios in Los Angeles, California U.S.A. to discuss yesterday's NFL action; and more.

12.title: Ryan Clark/"Florida Keys"
12.plot: National Football League analyst Ryan Clark joins in to discuss last night's Seattle Seahawks at Chicago Bears game; Stephen's A-List: Top 5 NFL Teams; and much more.

13.title: Damien Woody/Paul Finebaum/Will Cain/"Ram-page"
13.plot: Max rejoins Molly and Stephen A. at the ESPN studios at Seaport District on Pier 17 in New York City, New York U.S.A. as they debate if the Los Angeles Rams should be the current favorite to win National Football League Super Bowl 53; more.

14.title: Dana White/Darren Woodson/Jackie MacMullan/Tedy Bruschi
14.plot: Sportswriter Jackie MacMullan joins in to discuss the results of the National Basketball Association's investigation into allegations of sexual harassment and other misconduct against a member of the Dallas Mavericks organization; more.

75.title: Mamba Out
75.plot: Skip and Stephen A. debate the latest sports stories. Kobe Bryant's final game. Golden State Warriors break the single season NBA win record with a 73 win 9 loss record. Los Angeles Rams trade for the #1 pick in the upcoming NFL draft.

76.title: NBA Playoff Preview
76.plot: The panel discusses and debates key first round match-ups in the NBA playoffs.

77.title: Jon "Bones" Jones
77.plot: Former UFC champion Jon "Bones" Jones joins the show to discuss his trials, tribulations and return to the octagon.

78.title: LaRoche Last Word
78.plot: The panel debates the reasons for the retirement of professional baseball player Adam LaRoche as well as other hot topics.

79.title: Broken Man-ziel
79.plot: The panel discusses the hard times of free agent NFL quarterback Johnny Manziel as well as other hot topics.

80.title: Let's Make a Deal
80.plot: Skip and Stephen A. discuss the latest trades to move up in the upcoming NFL draft, NBA action and much more.

81.title: Remembering Prince
81.plot: The panel discusses the latest action in the NBA playoffs and a moving segment on music icon Prince.

82.title: Keegan-Michael Key
82.plot: The panel debates the latest on Deflategate, the NBA playoffs are discussed, an interview with Keegan-Michael Key and much more.

83.title: Broken Season?
83.plot: Skip and Stephen A. debate how the impact of the injury to Los Angeles Clippers point guard Chris Paul will affect their NBA playoff run. Also, Stephen Curry injury, the Tom Brady suspension and much more are discussed.

84.title: Dallas Dilemma
84.plot: Skip announces he will be leaving the show in June. The guys discuss which collegiate football player the Dallas Cowboys will draft in the first round, Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Sam Bradford wants to be traded, and much more.

85.title: Take Your Pick
85.plot: Skip and Stephen A. discuss tonight's first round of the NFL draft, the latest on the NBA playoffs, the cancellation of the Conor McGregor - Nate Diaz match at UFC 200, and much more.

86.title: Tunsil Tumble
86.plot: Topics discussed include the 1st round highlights of the NFL draft, MLB's suspension of Dee Gordon and an NBA playoff update.

87.title: Ready to Rumble?
87.plot: Skip and Stephen A. discuss the latest NBA playoff action, final grades of the NFL draft, Floyd Mayweather's possible return to the ring, the Stephen A. appearance on General Hospital and more.

88.title: Herm Edwards/"What's the Magic Word?"
88.plot: Skip and Stephen A. debate the latest NBA playoff action, Magic Johnson tweets which free agents the Los Angeles Lakers should pursue this off season, Herm Edwards joins the show to talk about Miami Dolphins OT Laremy Tunsil, and much more.

89.title: Angry Bird
89.plot: The latest NBA playoff action is discussed as well as the latest on Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Sam Bradford wanting to be traded, should the Dallas Cowboys be favored to win the NFC East division, and much more.

90.title: Lecrae
90.plot: The guys debate the latest NBA playoff action, Charles Oakley rips Charles Barkley on Twitter, Indianapolis Colts quarterback Andrew Luck rated #92 in the NFL Network "Top 100 Players of 2016", Rap artist Lecrae joins the show, and more.

91.title: Doug Baldwin
91.plot: The guest panel debates the latest NBA Playoff action, NFL over/under win predictions for the 2016 season, special guest Seattle Seahawks wide receiver Doug Baldwin joins the show, and more.

92.title: KO Punch

imdb.title: ESPN First Take
